['-0.128 : On Thursday Snap Inc NYSE SNAP reported its thirdquarter earnings which clearly show revenue suffered due to Apple Incs NASDAQ AAPL iPhone privacy changes that disrupted the advertising business', '0.3818 :  Although this was expected the impact was stronger than anticipated', '-0.5719 :  The stock fell  upon the news as the company also warned that global supply chain interruptions and labor shortages are reducing the shortterm appetite to generate additional customer demand through Shares of rivals Facebook NASDAQ FB and Twitter were also down approximately  in afterhours', '-0.4588 : Accounting for headwinds posed by Apples privacy changes supply chain disruptions and labor shortages that are expected to stick around for a while fourthquarter revenue is expected to be in the range between billion and billion short of the billion Refinitivs survey of analysts expected', '-0.4404 :  Unfortunately these changes are taking place when supply chains should be operating at peak capacity and with peak advertising demand driving peak contestation and therefore peak pricing', '0.5434 : In a nutshell although some degree of business disruption was anticipated due to Apples improved privacy changes that Spiegel himself praised the impact was greater as it made it more difficult for advertising partners to measure and manage their ad campaigns for iOS', '0.8625 :  Although the dynamics of these challenges are difficult to predict the growth of the audience the communitys adoption of Snaps new products and the attractiveness to advertisers give the company confidence to be able to navigate this storm as it continues its path towards its longterm vision', '0.0 : The post Snap Couldnt Snap Out of Apples Privacy Changes appeared first on IAM Newswire', '0.0 : ']

['0.5859 : In this article we are going to estimate the intrinsic value of Apple NASDAQAAPL by estimating the companys future cash flows and discounting them to their present value', '0.0516 :  The Discounted Cash Flow DCF model is the tool we will apply to do this', '0.0 :  Dont get put off by the jargon the math behind it is actually quite straightforward', '0.0 : ', '0.3167 :  View our latest analysis for Apple We would point out that the most important inputs to a discounted cash flow are the discount rate and of course the actual cash flows', '0.0747 :  If you dont agree with these result have a go at the calculation yourself and play with the assumptions', '0.0 :  The DCF also does not consider the possible cyclicality of an industry or a companys future capital requirements so it does not give a full picture of a companys potential performance', '-0.3612 :  Given that we are looking at Apple as potential shareholders the cost of equity is used as the discount rate rather than the cost of capital or weighted average cost of capital WACC which accounts for debt', '0.0 :  In this calculation weve used which is based on a levered beta of Beta is a measure of a stocks volatility compared to the market as a whole', '0.2263 :  We get our beta from the industry average beta of globally comparable companies with an imposed limit between and which is a reasonable range for a stable business', '0.0 : ', '0.0 : Valuation is only one side of the coin in terms of building your investment thesis and it shouldnt be the only metric you look at when researching a company', '0.0 :  DCF models are not the beall and endall of investment valuation', '0.6124 :  Rather it should be seen as a guide to what assumptions need to be true for this stock to be underovervalued If a company grows at a different rate or if its cost of equity or risk free rate changes sharply the output can look very different', '0.296 :  Why is the intrinsic value higher than the current share price For Apple weve compiled three relevant elements you should look atRisks We feel that you should assess the  warning sign for Apple weve flagged before making an investment in the company', '0.0 : ']

['0.0258 : Reuters Shares of Snap Inc plummeted  on Thursday after the owner of photo messaging app Snapchat said privacy changes implemented by Apple Inc on iOS devices hurt the companys ability to target and measure its digital advertising', '-0.1446 : The Apple privacy updates were rolled out broadly in June and prevent digital advertisers from tracking iPhone users without their consent', '0.3182 : A new ad measurement tool provided by Apple hampered the ability for companies to measure the performance of their ads upending many of the ways advertisers have been accustomed to doing business for decades said Snap Chief Executive Evan Spiegel during a conference call with analysts', '0.0772 : Snap added it expects the Apple privacy changes and global supply chain disruptions to linger through the fourth quarter which is typically the highestearning period for social media companies when brands ramp up marketing for the holiday season', '0.0 : ']

['-0.4588 : SHANGHAIHONG KONG Reuters  Apple Incs talks with Chinas CATL and BYD over battery supplies for its planned electric vehicle have been mostly stalled after they refused to set up teams and build plants that would solely cater to the tech giant three people with knowledge of the discussions said', '0.0 : The firms informed Apple sometime in the past two months that they were not able to meet its requirements the people said', '-0.3412 :  But the company has not given up hope of resuming talks with either CATL or BYD according to one source', '0.624 : Chinese battery makers are more advanced than rivals in the development of lithium iron phosphate LFP batteries which are cheaper to produce and sources have previously said Apple favours this battery technology', '-0.296 : The Chinese firm has also found it impossible to set up a separate product development team exclusively working with Apple due to difficulties in finding sufficient personnel the person added', '0.0 : BYD which has an ironphosphate battery plant in Lancaster California declined to build a new factory and team that would solely focus on supplying Apple said two of the sources', '-0.2023 : The stalled discussions have meant that Apple has been considering Japanese battery makers and it sent a group of people to Japan this month they added', '0.0 : Panasonic Corp is one of the companies that Apple is considering said one of the people', '0.0 : The sources declined to be identified as the talks were confidential', '0.0 :  Apple BYD and Panasonic declined to comment', '0.0 : Sources told Reuters last year Apple was aiming to launch an electric car by  Apple has not publicly disclosed its plans', '0.0 : ', '0.0 : Any delays in securing battery supplies could further impede EV development for Apple which last month lost the head of its car project Doug Field after he decided to return to Ford Motor']

['0.0 : Apple has released its latest product a new cleaning cloth for its displays', '-0.2263 : But it claims to offer special features above and beyond any normal cleaning cloth  and Apple warns that using any other kind of cloth on its displays could damage them', '0.0 : As with any other Apple product it can be bought directly from the Apple Store where it has its own listing', '0.6249 :  Like other Apple products it includes its own special features as well as a whats in the box section which explains that there are no accessories that come with the polishing cloth', '0.4939 : Made with soft nonabrasive material the Polishing Cloth cleans any Apple display including nanotexture glass safely and the description reads', '0.0 : Nanotexture glass is a screen design that is included on Apples more premium computer screens such as the Pro Display XDR where it costs almost to add', '0.2235 :  The screen has tiny etchings right across it which mean that it has a matte appearance without the lower contrast that often comes with such displays', '-0.2263 : In Apples support articles on the Pro Display XDR it warns that cleaning the screen with a nonApple cloth can damage the screen', '0.0 :  The Pro Display XDR which costs does come with its own official Apple cleaning cloth', '0.0 : But the cloth can be used on any other kind of Apple display too', '0.34 : Apple launched the cloth straight after an event that saw the introduction of the AirPods  and two versions of the MacBook Pro which include new and much faster versions of its own chips', '0.0 :  The cloth was not mentioned during the actual live stream', '0.0 : According to its compatibility list it is not actually compatible with any of those new devices but that is likely because they have yet to be released', '-0.296 :  Otherwise the list includes just about every recent Apple product with a display with no indication that there is any product it is not compatible with', '0.0 : ']
